mapper.insert: insert into work_pickup_order (wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type) values (#{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultantBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update work_pickup_order set reservation_order_no = #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wpo_no = #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_by = #{receiveBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultant_by = #{consultantBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_type = #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = NOW(), modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman_mobile = #{linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where wpo_id = #{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order where wpo_id = #{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order where wpo_no = #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order

select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order where consultant_by = #{consultantBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status < 3

select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order where receive_by = #{receiveBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status < 3

select wpo_id, reservation_order_no, wpo_no, receive_by, consultant_by, customer_id, from_type, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, status, linkman, linkman_mobile, car_id, car_no, work_type from work_pickup_order where car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status < 3

select wpo.car_id as carId, wpo.car_no as carNo, wpo.wpo_id as wpoId, wpo.wpo_no as wpoNo, wpo.status as status, wpo.create_date as assignDate, ifnull(wpo.work_type, 'NULL') as workType,
user.realname as receiveName
from work_pickup_order wpo left join base_user user on user.user_id = wpo.receive_by
where wpo.wpo_id = #{wpoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
